title: How to Update Netflix Payment Information on Desktop or Mobile

steps.title: Open the Netflix app.
steps.content: Open the Netflix app. It's a black app with a red N . Log in if you're not signed in automatically.

steps.title: Tap Account near the bottom of the menu.
steps.content: Tap Account near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Update payment info.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Update payment info . If you don't have any payment methods for your account yet, tap Add payment info instead.

steps.title: Tap a payment method.
steps.content: Tap a payment method. The options are: Credit or Debit Card PayPal Tap next to Credit or Debit Card if you don't see the PayPal option.

steps.title: Enter the information for your payment method.
steps.content: Enter the information for your payment method. Fill in all the labeled fields or follow the onscreen prompts to enable Netflix to use your payment method.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Update Payment Method.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Update Payment Method . It's at the bottom of the form. Your payment information is now updated.

steps.title: Go to https://www.netflix.com in a Web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.netflix.com in a Web browser. Click Sign In , then enter your email address and password if you're not logged in automatically.

steps.title: Click the main profile.
steps.content: Click the main profile. It's usually your first name.

steps.title: Click .
steps.content: Click . It's in the upper-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Click Update payment info.
steps.content: Click Update payment info . It's on the right side of the page, in the "MEMBERSHIP & BILLING" section. If you don't have any payment methods for your account yet, tap Add payment info instead.

steps.title: Click a payment method.
steps.content: Click a payment method. The options are: Credit or Debit Card PayPal Click next to Credit or Debit Card if you don't see the PayPal option.

steps.title: Enter the information for your payment method.
steps.content: Enter the information for your payment method. Fill in all the labeled fields or follow the onscreen prompts to enable Netflix to use your payment method.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Update Payment Method.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Update Payment Method . It's at the bottom of the form. Your payment information is now updated.
